Sentimental Dancehall

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 05 September 2009. Tagged dancehall.
Short URL:

Jamaican music isn’t all guns, gay-bashing and daggering, you know. Here’s a couple of sentimental odes to Moms and Dads.

Letter to Mommy & Daddy–Chaka Demus & Yellowman

Love Mom & Dad–White Mice1

  1. I hadn’t listened to White Mice in a long while–such a strange voice.
